publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3445 Sarah Boyack: Edinburgh’s The Soap Co—That the Parliament commends Edinburgh-based social enterprise The Soap Co for its policy of incorporating a diverse and socially inclusive workforce into its business; praises the use of traditional and environmentally conscientious methods in the production of its goods; applauds The Soap Co’s use of the social enterprise not-for-profit model, which provides a financially stable, social and sustainable business model that many Scottish businesses could adopt and benefit from in the midst of the current recession; recognises the need to promote the development of social enterprises like The Soap Co across Scotland, and welcomes the contribution of Social Firms UK in helping to facilitate this.
